metadata.name: once in a life time
metadata.description:
Dancer: SHU KINOUCHI 
Film : SHU KINOUCHI  
Edit : SHU KINOUCHI 
Noise : SHU KINOUCHI

SHU minted with manifold.xyz 

2022 Jan. 
1920 x 1080  
7 min 21 sec 
219.4 mb 
33 editions


1  
Ichi go Ichi e : For this time only or Once in a life time is a Japanese cultural concept to treasure unrepeated moments  
dance improvisation = unrepeatable moments  
Cloning myself = repetition = accumulation = life 
2  
One body practice this uncertainty  
Cloning my one body makes visual more complex and appealing  
it starts to have more context  
It represents improvement by accumulation in repetitions 
3  
my relationship to new and old me in time and space visualized
